summary: Completed testing of ColdIQ feature expansion (Starter/Pro tiers to 100%). All backend tests passed (24/24). Fixed missing Target icon import in AnalysisMetrics.jsx. Server-side analysis metrics (readability, spam, CTA, subject) work correctly for Starter+. Fix Suggestions with priority badges (HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW) display correctly. Performance page with time range selector (7D/30D/90D) works for Pro users. Sequence Analysis page allows adding/removing emails and analyzing multi-email sequences. Growth Agency 'Contact Us' redirects to /contact form which submits successfully. Sidebar shows PRO badges for Pro-only features. Free/Starter users see locked state on Performance and Sequence pages.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check API accessible
Backend: Free/Starter/Pro user login successful
Backend: Analysis returns readability_score (server-side, guaranteed)
Backend: Analysis returns spam_keywords detection
Backend: Analysis returns subject_line_analysis
Backend: Analysis returns cta_analysis
Backend: Analysis returns fix_suggestions with priority badges
Backend: Analysis returns inbox_placement_score
Backend: Sequence analysis blocked for free tier (403)
Backend: Sequence analysis blocked for starter tier (403)
Backend: Sequence analysis works for pro tier
Backend: Sequence requires minimum 2 emails
Backend: Sequence limits to maximum 5 emails
Backend: Contact form submission successful
Backend: Contact form validation (name, email, company required)
Backend: Analysis history accessible for performance tracking
Backend: Insights dashboard available for pro tier
Backend: Tier features correctly configured (free/starter/pro)
Frontend: Pro user sidebar shows Sequences with PRO badge
Frontend: Pro user sidebar shows Performance with PRO badge
Frontend: Performance page loads with time range selector (7D/30D/90D)
Frontend: Sequence page allows adding emails (up to 5)
Frontend: Sequence page has Analyze Full Sequence button
Frontend: Pricing page Growth Agency card has 'Contact Us' button
Frontend: Contact Us redirects to /contact form
Frontend: Contact form submits successfully with success message
Frontend: Free user sees locked state on Performance page
Frontend: Free user sees locked state on Sequence page
Frontend: Starter user analysis shows Fix This section with priority badges
seed_data_creation: Used existing test accounts from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: ColdIQ feature expansion tested successfully. Server-side analysis (readability, spam, CTA, subject) guaranteed for Starter+ users. Fix Suggestions with priority badges working. Performance tracking page with charts and time range selector working for Pro users. Sequence analysis page working for Pro users with add/remove email functionality. Growth Agency contact form working. Tier-gating correctly implemented - Free/Starter users see locked state on Pro features. Fixed missing Target icon import in AnalysisMetrics.jsx.
